mapper.insert: insert into T_RELET_APPLY (RELET_APPLY_ID, HOUSE_INFO_ID, CLIENT_NAME, HOUSE_ACREAGE, LEASE_START_TIME, LEASE_END_TIME, TYPE, RETREA_TIME, RETREA_TYPE, SINGLE_PRICE, SUBTOTAL, PRIVILEGE_SUM, LEASE_DEPOSIT, TOTAL, CREATION_TIME, UPDATE_TIME) values (T_ENTER_APPLY_ID_SEQ.Nextval, #{houseInfoId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{clientName,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{houseAcreage,jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{leaseStartTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{leaseEndTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{type,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{retreaTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{retreaType,jdbcType=DATE}, #{singlePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{subtotal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{privilegeSum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{leaseDeposit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{total,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{creationTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=DATE})
mapper.update: update T_RELET_APPLY set HOUSE_INFO_ID = #{houseInfoId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CLIENT_NAME = #{clientName,jdbcType=OTHER}, HOUSE_ACREAGE = #{houseAcreage,jdbcType=FLOAT}, LEASE_START_TIME = #{leaseStartTime,jdbcType=DATE}, LEASE_END_TIME = #{leaseEndTime,jdbcType=DATE}, TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RETREA_TIME = #{retreaTime,jdbcType=DATE}, RETREA_TYPE = #{retreaType,jdbcType=DATE}, SINGLE_PRICE = #{singlePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SUBTOTAL = #{subtotal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PRIVILEGE_SUM = #{privilegeSum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LEASE_DEPOSIT = #{leaseDeposit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TOTAL = #{total,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATION_TIME = #{creationTime,jdbcType=DATE}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=DATE} where RELET_APPLY_ID = #{reletApplyId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select RELET_APPLY_ID, HOUSE_INFO_ID, CLIENT_NAME, HOUSE_ACREAGE, LEASE_START_TIME, LEASE_END_TIME, TYPE, RETREA_TIME, RETREA_TYPE, SINGLE_PRICE, SUBTOTAL, PRIVILEGE_SUM, LEASE_DEPOSIT, TOTAL, CREATION_TIME, UPDATE_TIME from T_RELET_APPLY where RELET_APPLY_ID = #{reletApplyId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

select RELET_APPLY_ID, HOUSE_INFO_ID, CLIENT_NAME, HOUSE_ACREAGE, LEASE_START_TIME, LEASE_END_TIME, TYPE, RETREA_TIME, RETREA_TYPE, SINGLE_PRICE, SUBTOTAL, PRIVILEGE_SUM, LEASE_DEPOSIT, TOTAL, CREATION_TIME, UPDATE_TIME from T_RELET_APPLY
